message: It seems to me, however, that with "longest chain" as the heuristic for the "which represents reality" is a weak metric. What is to stop someone (botnet) from just generating a longer string?
Also, will this cause an inflation of the currency every 18 months due to Moore's Law?
No because there is a max amount
I know a guy with a system to generate and spend bitcoons randomly if you want to start using them to buy stuff from shady Russians
"because there is a max amount".. that's in reference to the longest chain problem? Seems like you could just generate strings that are MAX-1 and always have the "longest chain" in that case.
no in reference to the inflation issue
But they say 1cpu = 1 vote (to validate something via computing its hash). If all of my servers are 2x as fast as your servers, it would seem like I would get 2x the votes, no?
